title: As Governor’s Race Tightens, a Frantic Call to Action Among Democrats
description: Democrats and their allies are pouring millions of dollars into late-stage ads and get-out-the-vote efforts to help Gov. Kathy Hochul as she fends off her Republican challenger, Lee Zeldin.
dc:creator: Luis Ferré-Sadurní and Nicholas Fandos
media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden with Gov. Kathy Hochul at the Micron Pavilion in Syracuse Thursday.
